itunes:title: Episode 071: Jono Starsmore (feat. Kat Overland)
title: Episode 071: Jono Starsmore (feat. Kat Overland)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 71 of CEREBRO, Connor and two-time Eisner Award-winning editor Kat Overland (Women Write About Comics) get all wrapped up with Jono Starsmore, the churlish Chamber! Introduced as part of Generation X, British goth Jono has spent a lot of time sulking because his mutant power made his face explode. Understandable, honestly!

The CEREBRO character file on Chamber begins at 31:30.

(Content Advisory: Jono's story includes child abuse, ableism, and suicidal ideation.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
